main event: A person observed an unidentified object in the twilight sky over Rockville, Maryland on 27 June 1963.
interesting points: The object appeared to be two times as bright as the star Vega., The object was white and silent, moving behind and in front of clouds., It did not change color or move significantly during the 30-minute observation., The object was visible from an angle of 10 degrees to 90 degrees relative to the moon., There was no evidence of any known aircraft or satellite.
sighted object: unidentified bright white object in the sky
witness description: The witness was a 56-year-old male who reported the sighting.
